summary.para: Represents one of the base persistent classes from which business classes can be inherited.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.BaseObject.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpo.Session)

summary.para: Used to initialize a new instance of a BaseObject descendant, in a particular Session.

member.param: A DevExpress.Xpo.Session object which represents a persistent object's cache where the business object will be instantiated.

summary.para: Creates a new instance of the BaseObject class.
Invoked when the current object is about to be initialized after its creation.
Set this field to true before profiling the application via XPO Profiler.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.BaseObject.Oid

summary.para: Specifies the persistent object's identifier.

member.value: A globally unique identifier which represents the persistent object's identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.BaseObject.OidInitializationMode

summary.para: Specifies when a new GUID value is assigned to the property.

member.value: An enumeration value specifying when a new GUID value is assigned to the Oid property.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.BaseObject.ToString

summary.para: Returns a human-readable string that represents the current business object.

member.returns: A string representing the current business object.

summary.para: The XPO persistent class used to store model difference aspects in the database.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifferenceAspect.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpo.Session)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the ModelDifferenceAspect class.

member.param: A DevExpress.Xpo.Session object which represents a persistent object's cache where the business object will be instantiated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifferenceAspect.DisplayName

summary.para: Gets the language code of the current ModelDifferenceAspect object, or the "(Default language)" text.

member.value: A string which specifies the name of the current model difference aspect, or "(Default language)" if the aspect name is empty (if the current aspect specifies culture-neutral model differences).

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifferenceAspect.Name

summary.para: Specifies the language code of the current ModelDifferenceAspect object. The empty value means that the current aspect specifies culture-neutral model differences.

member.value: A string which specifies the name of the current model difference aspect.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifferenceAspect.Owner

summary.para: Specifies the object the current ModelDifferenceAspect belongs to.

member.value: A the object specifying the model differences object that owns the current aspect.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifferenceAspect.Xml

summary.para: Specifies the XML code of the current ModelDifferenceAspect object.

member.value: A string which is the XML code of the current model difference aspect.

summary.para: The XPO persistent class used to store model differences in the database.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpo.Session)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the ModelDifference class.

member.param: A DevExpress.Xpo.Session object which represents a persistent object's cache where the business object will be instantiated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.Aspects

summary.para: Gets a collection of model difference aspects associated with the ModelDifference object.

member.value: An <> list of model difference aspects.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.ContextId

summary.para: Specifies the context identifier of the current ModelDifference object that allows distinguishing model differences designed for different applications using the same database.

member.value: A string which is the context identifier.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.UserId

summary.para: Specifies the identifier of a user who owns the current ModelDifference object.

member.value: A string which is the identifier of a user who owns the current model differences.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.UserName

summary.para: Gets the name of a user who owns the current ModelDifference object.

member.value: A string which is the name of a user who owns the current model differences.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ModelDifference.Version

summary.para: Specifies the version of the current ModelDifference object.

member.value: An integer value which is the version number of the model differences object.

summary.para: The XPO persistent class used to store media data in the database.

summary.para: Used to initialize a new instance of a MediaDataObject descendant in a specific Session.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.MediaDataObject.MediaData

summary.para: Specifies a byte array with media data that is loaded from a database on demand when required.

member.value: A byte array object that is loaded from a database on demand when required.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.MediaDataObject.MediaDataKey

summary.para: Specifies a key value associated with the byte array.

member.value: A string which is a key value.

summary.para: The persistent class used to store reports in the Reports V2 Module. Inherits and thus has the Guid-type identifier.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpo.Session,System.Type)

summary.para: Used to initialize a new instance of a ReportDataV2 descendant intended to persist a report that targets a specified data type in a specific Session.

member.param: A DevExpress.Xpo.Session object which represents a persistent object's cache where the business object will be instantiated.
A object specifying the data type that the report data source is bound to.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.#ctor(DevExpress.Xpo.Session)

summary.para: Used to initialize a new instance of a ReportDataV2 descendant in a specific Session.

member.param: A DevExpress.Xpo.Session object which represents a persistent object's cache where the business object will be instantiated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.Content

summary.para: Specifies the report content.

member.value: A byte array that is the report content.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.DataTypeCaption

summary.para: Gets the type caption of persistent objects that are displayed within the report.

member.value: A string that specifies the type caption of persistent objects that are displayed within the report.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.DataTypeName

summary.para: Gets the name of the report's data type.

member.value: A string which is the name of the report's data type.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.DisplayName

summary.para: Specifies the report's display name.

member.value: A string which is the report's display name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.IsInplaceReport

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the report is inplace.

member.value: true, if the report is inplace; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.IsPredefined

summary.para: Gets a boolean value that indicates whether or not the report is predefined.

member.value: true, if a report is predefined in code; false, if a report is created at runtime.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.BaseImpl.ReportDataV2.ParametersObjectType

summary.para: Specifies the type of the reports parameter object.

member.value: A System.Type of an object that specifies report parameters (typically, the descendant).

summary.para: Specifies the name of the reports parameter object type.

member.value: A string which is the name of the reports parameter object type.

summary.para: Specifies the type of the predefined report.

member.value: A System.Type object that specifies the type of the predefined report.

summary.para: Contains values specifying when a new GUID value is assigned to the property.
Specifies that a new GUID value is assigned to the property in the AfterConstruction method override.
Specifies that a new GUID value is assigned to the property in the OnSaving method override.
